title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.1 - Application for compensation medical bureau license required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.1 - Application for compensation medical bureau license required

State Regulations

When a physician, in association or in copartnership with
another physician or physicians, or through another physician or physicians as
employees or agents, maintains and operates one or more offices principally for
the treatment of injured claimants under the Workers' Compensation Law, he or
she shall apply for a compensation medical bureau license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
